receiveChange(Change) - Method in class filesystem.FilesystemService
Is informed by the SynchronizationService about a new change.
receiveChanges(List<Change>) - Method in class filesystem.FilesystemService
Is informed by the SynchronizationService about new changes.
receiveGroupChange(Change) - Method in class group.GroupService
The SynchronizationService component informs the GroupService component about a group change, and the GroupService will process the change and will transmit this information for storing to the GroupInfoRepository component.
receiveMessage(Message) - Method in class messaging.MessagingService
The MessagingService receives a new Message from the remote centralized Messaging service
receiveMessage(Message) - Method in class network.NetworkListener
Receives a message from another user via the remote MessagingService.
receiveReplyFromAS(Object) - Method in class network.NetworkListener
Receives reply to a request from the Authetication Service.
receiveReplyFromDS(Object) - Method in class network.NetworkListener
Receives reply to a request from the Discovery Service.
receiveReplyFromNS(Object) - Method in class network.NetworkListener
Receives reply to a request from the Naming Service.
removeGroup(Group) - Method in class group.GroupService
The GroupService completely removes a group from the system.
removeMessage(Message) - Method in class messaging.Mailbox
Removes(deletes) a message from the mailbox.
removeUser(Group, User) - Method in class group.GroupService
GroupService starts performing the necessary steps for removing an user from the given group.
request - Variable in class network.DiscoveryServiceRequest
The type of request that needs to be sent by the device to the DiscoveryService, as defined by DSRequestType.
request - Variable in class network.NamingServiceRequest
The type of request that needs to be sent by the device to the NamingService, as defined by NSRequestType.
